item.title: Shock in Cameroon as 74-year-old opposition firebrand dies in detention
item.description: Anicet Ekane's lawyer says the family was given little explanation - "his wife was just presented the corpse".

item.title: Death toll in Indonesia floods passes 500 with hundreds more missing
item.description: Another 500 people are missing, while thousands more have been injured after a cyclone hit the region.

item.title: UK MP Tulip Siddiq given jail sentence in Bangladesh after trial in her absence
item.description: The former minister and niece of Bangladesh's ousted former leader, who received a two-year sentence, says the charges are politically motivated.

item.title: Three children among four killed in shooting at 'birthday party' in California
item.description: Officials say 11 others are injured in what they believe is a "targeted" shooting at a children's birthday party.

item.title: Four dead in Russian attack as diplomatic efforts to end war continue
item.description: As US negotiating teams continue to hold talks with Moscow and Kyiv, Russia's attacks on Ukraine continue.
